story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened The House of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Tommen Baratheon got stronger and learnt military strategy. In Seagard at sunrise ,Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaenys Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaenys Targaryen were almost in The Ruby Ford when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under treat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaenys Targaryen celebrated in Saltpans by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the treasure of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Rickon Stark to seek help. Rickon Stark was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Winterfell at the first day of Spring, Bran Stark met Robb Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Torrhen's Square at the Summer Solstice , Bran Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the castle. In The Ruby Ford celebrated with  Robb Stark by getting married .

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a Lord from the House Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the castle of Robert Baratheon . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  King, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of teleportation. In The Vale of Arryn at Night ,Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Renly Baratheon finally found Tyrion Lannister in White Harbor. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Renly Baratheon celebrated in The Dreadfort by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a regent whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the freedom of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Daario Naharis to seek help. Daario Naharis was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Riverlands at the Autumnal Equinox, Cersei Lannister met Shae and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring, Cersei Lannister and Shae were almost in The Ruby Ford when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Shae went to Castle Black and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an official. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the freedom of Tyrion Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Eddard Stark, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of mind controlling. In Karhold at Christmas ,Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister were almost in The Ruby Ford when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by getting married.

story: A long time ago Cersei Lannister, Queen regnant from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a regent. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the jewel of Cersei Lannister. Initially Cersei Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Cassana Baratheon got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. In Seagard at sunrise ,Cersei Lannister met Tywin Lannister and they formed an alliance. Finally in Bear Island at the first day of Spring , Cersei Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Tywin Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the castle. story: Jon Snow was King for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a squire. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to The House of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Steffon Baratheon, Jon Snow learnt the power of invisibility. In Kings Landing at the first day of Spring ,Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the castle. In Kings Landing celebrated with  Rhaenys Targaryen by watching a play .

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Catelyn Stark to seek help. Catelyn Stark was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In Red Keep at the first day of Spring ,Bran Stark met Robb Stark and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Bran Stark and Robb Stark were almost in The Eyrie when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Bran Stark and Robb Stark went to Saltpans and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasure of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Shae to seek help. Shae was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In Kings Landing at Christmas ,Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell were almost in Kings Landing when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell went to The Whispering Wood and celebrated by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a ruler. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Viserys Targaryen, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of slowing Time. During a long training session in The Ruby Ford at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Jon Snow. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow were almost in Kings Landing when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow celebrated in The Iron Island by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, King from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the castle of Jon Snow . Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help. Lancel Lannister was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Eyrie at Night, Jon Snow met Rhaegar Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen were almost in Oldstones when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen celebrated in The Iron Island by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the jewel of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Lady got stronger and learnt military strategy. In The Iron Island at Night ,Jon Snow met Ygritte and they formed an alliance. At Night, Jon Snow and Ygritte were almost in The Twins when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Twins celebrated with  Ygritte by making fireworks .

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a an assassin. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the castle of Arya Stark . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Margaery Tyrell, Arya Stark learnt the power of teleportation. In Bear Island at sunrise ,Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Bear Island at Night , Arya Stark faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Rickon Stark and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Raventree Hall celebrated with  Rickon Stark by  having a feast .

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the freedom of Margaery Tyrell . Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Lady got stronger and learnt invisibility. In Moat Cailin at the first day of Spring ,Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Tommen Baratheon finally found Petyr Baelish in Seagard. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon went to Oldstones and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a military leader. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the jewel of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid, but with the help of Tommen Baratheon got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in Karhold at the Autumnal Equinox, Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Renly Baratheon finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the beloved the jewel. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with  Renly Baratheon by  having a feast .

story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a hunter. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the peace of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Viserys Targaryen to seek help. Viserys Targaryen was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Torrhen's Square at sunrise, Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon and they immediately became friends. Finally in Riverlands at the Winter Solstice , Robert Baratheon faced Arya Stark . With the help of Renly Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the beloved the freedom. In The Twins celebrated with  Renly Baratheon by getting married .

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a soldier. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the treasure of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Rhaenys Targaryen got stronger and learnt invisibility. On the way to White Harbor at the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Ygritte and they immediately became friends. At sunrise, Jon Snow and Ygritte were almost in Riverlands when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the jewel. In Crossroads Inn celebrated with  Ygritte by making fireworks .

story: Once upon a time, there was a soldier whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the jewel of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in The Trident at Christmas, Jon Snow met Aerys II Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Jon Snow and Aerys II Targaryen were almost in Raventree Hall when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Aerys II Targaryen celebrated in The Twins by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the freedom of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Khal Drogo got stronger and learnt military strategy. During a long training session in Riverlands at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Tyrion Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon were almost in Torrhen's Square when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Eyrie celebrated with  Myrcella Baratheon by getting married .

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a procurer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the treasure of Petyr Baelish . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Cassana Baratheon, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of gravity Control. In The Eyrie at sunrise ,Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they formed an alliance. At Night, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in Oldstones when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated in Torrhen's Square by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the freedom of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Tommen Baratheon to seek help. Tommen Baratheon was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In Saltpans at the first day of Spring ,Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Vale of Arryn at the Winter Solstice , Jon Snow faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Aegon Targaryen and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Aegon Targaryen celebrated in Saltpans by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the treasure of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Petyr Baelish to seek help. Petyr Baelish was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In Torrhen's Square at Night ,Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in The Vale of Arryn when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the jewel. In Moat Cailin celebrated with  Eddard Stark by playing a game .

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a spy. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the treasure of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Willas Tyrell got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In Castle Black at Night ,Jon Snow met Benjen Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Benjen Stark finally found Robert Baratheon in Seagard. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Benjen Stark celebrated in Red Keep by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the freedom of Tyrion Lannister . Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Jon Snow got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in The Whispering Wood at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Night, Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister were almost in Riverlands when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister went to The Iron Island and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a hunter. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened The House of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Ygritte, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of fire sorcery. In Crossroads Inn at sunrise ,Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Trident at Night , Robert Baratheon faced Cersei Lannister . With the help of Gendry and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Cersei Lannister . This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the beloved The House. In Karhold celebrated with  Gendry by getting married .

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Jon Snow threatened The House of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Daario Naharis, Bran Stark learnt the power of teleportation. During a long training session in The Trident at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Sansa Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Sansa Stark finally found Jon Snow in White Harbor. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Jon Snow. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Bran Stark and Sansa Stark went to The Iron Island and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Benjen Stark got stronger and learnt gravity Control. During a long training session in Crossroads Inn at Night, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Willas Tyrell finally found Cersei Lannister in Deepwood Motte. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Winterfell by watching a play.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Tommen Baratheon got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to Raventree Hall at Christmas, Bran Stark met Robb Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Robb Stark finally found Petyr Baelish in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. Eventually the castle was safe again. Bran Stark and Robb Stark went to Deepwood Motte and celebrated by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to The House of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Jaime Lannister to seek help. Jaime Lannister was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Dreadfort at the Summer Solstice ,Arya Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually The House was safe again. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark went to Red Keep and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a soldier whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Stark. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the castle of Jon Snow . Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Willas Tyrell to seek help. Willas Tyrell was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Oldstones at Christmas, Jon Snow met Viserys Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Viserys Targaryen finally found Tyrion Lannister in Crossroads Inn. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Twins celebrated with  Viserys Targaryen by watching a play .

story: Jon Snow was King for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a spy. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened  the peace of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Catelyn Stark got stronger and learnt teleportation. In Deepwood Motte at the Winter Solstice ,Jon Snow met Aerys II Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow and Aerys II Targaryen were almost in The Eyrie when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Aerys II Targaryen celebrated in Great Sept of Baelor by organizing a concert.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a mass murderer. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the treasure of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Willas Tyrell to seek help. Willas Tyrell was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In Seagard at the Winter Solstice ,Cersei Lannister met Tyrion Lannister and they formed an alliance. Finally in Great Sept of Baelor at Night , Cersei Lannister faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Tyrion Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . After the victory, the jewel was not under treat anymore. Cersei Lannister and Tyrion Lannister celebrated in Raventree Hall by playing a game.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a mass murderer. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the jewel of Arya Stark . Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Rhaenys Targaryen got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In The Twins at Night ,Arya Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Trident at the Summer Solstice , Arya Stark faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the freedom. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with  Sansa Stark by getting married .

story: Once upon a time, there was a vigilante whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the freedom of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Garlan Tyrell got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Torrhen's Square at the first day of Spring, Arya Stark met Catelyn Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark and Catelyn Stark were almost in Great Sept of Baelor when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Catelyn Stark celebrated in Kings Landing by getting married.

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a squire. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the freedom of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Winterfell at the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow met Rickard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Rickard Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Rickard Stark celebrated in Bear Island by getting married.

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a a revolutionary. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the peace of Tyrion Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Catelyn Stark, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of slowing Time. During a long training session in Riverlands at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Lancel Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Iron Island at sunrise , Tyrion Lannister faced Bran Stark . With the help of Lancel Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . Eventually the castle was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Lancel Lannister went to The Twins and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the castle of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Rickon Stark got stronger and learnt gravity Control. During a long training session in Winterfell at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Garlan Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Riverlands at Christmas , Margaery Tyrell faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Garlan Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . Eventually the peace was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Garlan Tyrell went to The Dreadfort and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the peace of Petyr Baelish . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Robert Baratheon, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of fire sorcery. On the way to Seagard at the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. At Night, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in Bear Island when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved the jewel. In Red Keep celebrated with  Robert Arryn by making fireworks .

story: Once upon a time, there was a squire whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the castle of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Mace Tyrell, Jon Snow learnt the power of gravity Control. During a long training session in Bear Island at Night, Jon Snow met Lyanna Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice , Jon Snow faced Arya Stark . With the help of Lyanna Stark and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the peace. In Seagard celebrated with  Lyanna Stark by  having a feast .

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Robb Stark got stronger and learnt slowing Time. During a long training session in Oldstones at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Khal Drogo. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen and Khal Drogo were almost in Bear Island when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Khal Drogo celebrated in The Eyrie by  having a feast.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an official. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Princess got stronger and learnt invisibility. In Seagard at the Winter Solstice ,Tyrion Lannister met Shae and they formed an alliance. At sunrise, Tyrion Lannister and Shae were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the castle. In Deepwood Motte celebrated with  Shae by playing a game .

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the freedom of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister were almost in Castle Black when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister went to The Vale of Arryn and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Loras Tyrell got stronger and learnt military strategy. On the way to Riverlands at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Loras Tyrell and they immediately became friends. Finally in Karhold at the first day of Spring , Margaery Tyrell faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Loras Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the castle. In Oldstones celebrated with  Loras Tyrell by getting married .

story: Once upon a time, there was a vigilante whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  the castle of Arya Stark . Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Lady to seek help. Lady was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. In Torrhen's Square at Christmas ,Arya Stark met Robb Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Moat Cailin at Night , Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . Eventually the peace was safe again. Arya Stark and Robb Stark went to The Trident and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the castle of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Rhaegar Targaryen got stronger and learnt military strategy. During a long training session in Great Sept of Baelor at sunrise, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell were almost in Kings Landing when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell went to Oldstones and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a an official. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the castle of Tyrion Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Eddard Stark, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of military strategy. In Karhold at the Winter Solstice ,Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister and they formed an alliance. At the first day of Spring, Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister were almost in The Eyrie when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister celebrated in Seagard by organizing a concert.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to The House of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Eyrie at the first day of Spring, Cersei Lannister met Lancel Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Dreadfort at Christmas , Cersei Lannister faced Bran Stark . With the help of Lancel Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . Eventually the treasure was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Lancel Lannister went to Red Keep and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the jewel of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Sansa Stark got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Kings Landing at Christmas, Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Eyrie at the Summer Solstice , Jon Snow faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Rhaenys Targaryen and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . Eventually the freedom was safe again. Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen went to Castle Black and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Jon Snow threatened the treasure of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Robert Baratheon to seek help. Robert Baratheon was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. In Deepwood Motte at the Autumnal Equinox ,Bran Stark met Rickon Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Rickon Stark finally found Jon Snow in Castle Black. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Jon Snow. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Bran Stark and Rickon Stark went to Karhold and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened The House of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Aerys II Targaryen got stronger and learnt teleportation. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at Christmas, Bran Stark met Rickon Stark and they immediately became friends. At sunrise, Bran Stark and Rickon Stark were almost in Winterfell when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Rickon Stark celebrated in Great Sept of Baelor by making fireworks.
